dialogue: At great expense, I've just hired Nildo Orbfutz as a consultant. He will increase our productivity hereby calculating how much time is actually wasted!
Well, Nildo. How did you acquire your credentials? Degree in business management? H.R.? P.R.? Psychology?
Let me guess: You've been fired from every job you ever had... for wasting time?
Welcome to the wonderful world of consulting.
